events.name: Tirana Startup Weekend
events.about:
Welcome to Tirana Startup Weekend 20-22 April 2012

Get inspired trough action and make real change towards a mindset of an entrepreneur!

Do you have an idea or want to make an idea into a business? Come as you are, form teams, learn business skills and launch startups. We provide the community of business people, technical experts, mentors and investors. Register for a ticket here! Startup Weekend is a global network of passionate leaders and entrepreneurs on a mission to inspire, educate, and empower individuals, teams and communities.
